General.Name: Nihon Trim Co. Ltd
General.Description: Nihon Trim Co., Ltd. develops and sells electrolyzed hydrogen water systems in Japan and internationally. The company also offers cartridges and electrolyzed hydrogen water apparatuses for agriculture and livestock industries, as well as households; and electrolyzed water hemodialysis systems for medical care. In addition, it manufactures and sells bottled water; and undertakes research and development works of electrolyzed hydrogen water. Nihon Trim Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
General.Address: Herbis ENT Office Tower, Osaka, Japan, 530-0001
